message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $10000 to me due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Considering its worth to you is $8000, I propose a fair deal of $9500 for the product. This price reflects the value it holds for both of us while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
